entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this morning then changing to periods of rain mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h late this morning then light this afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
